Function reference

All functions

check_conf_lvl()
INTERNAL: Check if a confidence level is entered in decimal form
check_test()
INTERNAL: Check if an error will occur later
finalize_plot()
INTERNAL: Add default theme options to plots
finalize_tbl()
INTERNAL: Add default theme options to tables
find_na()
INTERNAL: Find missing values
infer_1mean()
Create a summary table for a one-sample mean interval
infer_1prop()
Create a summary table for a one-sample proportion interval
infer_2mean()
All-in-one alternate two-sample means test
infer_2mean_int()
Create a summary table of a two-sample mean interval
infer_2mean_test()
Create a summary table for a two-sample mean test
infer_2prop()
All-in-one alternate two-sample proportion test
infer_2prop_int()
Create a summary table for a two-sample proportion interval
infer_2prop_test()
Create a summary table for a two-sample proportion test
infer_anova()
Create a ANOVA table
infer_chisq()
Create a summary table for a chi-squared test
infer_paired()
Create a summary table for a paired means test
infer_reg()
Create a summary table for a linear regression test
plot_bar()
Create a simple bar plot
plot_box()
Create a simple boxplot
plot_hist()
Create a simple histogram
plot_scatter()
Create a simple scatterplot
sig_round()
INTERNAL: Round a number using standard rounding or sigfigs
tbl_1var()
Create a one way data table
tbl_2var()
Create a two way data table
tbl_corr()
Create a simple correlation table
tbl_num_sum()
Create numerical summaries
tbl_pctile()
Create percentile summaries
